ConditionDescription: On the same turn Resiliance Beat is selected, select 2 or more Layers that use Moonsault with someone other than this character.
On the same turn Cleaer Stream Fist is selected, select 2 or more skills that are a blow-type attack with someone other than this character.
On the same turn Black Hand is selected, select 2 or more gauntlet skills of anyone than this character.

On the same turn Cool Breeze Cannon is selected, select 2 or more skills that are single-enemy blow attacks or have a strength of D or lower (Does not include Total Strength Rating attacks) with someone other than this character.

On the same turn Idol Punch is selected, select 2 or more skills that are either single-enemy blow attacks or blow attacks that have a strength of D or lower (*Does not include Total Strength Rating attacks) with someone other than this character.
On the same turn Tonfa Straight is selected, select 2 or more skills of Layers other than this character that use gauntlets.
On the same turn 717th Bursting Ball of Light is selected, select 2 or more skills of Layers other than this character that use gauntlets.
On the same turn Never Punch is selected, select 2 or more skills of Layers other than this character that use gauntlets.
On the same turn Avice Blow is selected, select 2 or more skills that are single-enemy blow type attacks with someone other than this character.

「インキネスロア」を選択した同じターンに、貫属性全体または闇属性を含んだ双属性のスキルを、自身を除く2体以上が選択する。
「フロストガン」を選択した同じターンに、魔法攻撃単体スキルを、自身を除く2体以上が選択する。
